intent_template: Can you add {{item}} to my cart and take me to the final checkout screen before placing the order?

instantiation_dict.item: the cheapest live lobster that doesn't have a lemon in its picture

intent: Can you add the cheapest live lobster that doesn't have a lemon in its picture to my cart and take me to the final checkout screen before placing the order?

program_html.locator: func:get_query_text(__page__, "#opc-sidebar > div.opc-block-summary > div > div.content.minicart-items > div > ol")

must_include: Live Wild Caught Maine Lobster Approx. (1.5 lb. ea., 6 lobsters about 10lb) Express Shipped Chilled
